00031 void RewriteParticleNumbers(unsigned isnap)
00032 {
00033   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Extracting particle numbers... for #(halos) = ");
00034   std::ifstream fin;
00035   std::ofstream fout;
00036   fin.open((Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles").
00037        c_str(), std::ios_base::in);
00038   fout.open((Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles2").
00039         c_str(), std::ios_base::out);
00040   int Idummy = 0;
00041   int Ihalos = 0;
00042   int Icounter = 0;
00043   //  float Fdummy = 0.0f;
00044 
00045   fin >> Ihalos; //number of halos
00046   std::cout << Ihalos << std::flush;
00047   for (; Ihalos > 0; --Ihalos) {
00048     //    fin >> Idummy; //unknown
00049     fin >> Icounter; //number of particles in current halo
00050     fout << Icounter << std::endl;
00051     //fin >> Fdummy; //mass of current halo
00052     for (int i = 0; i < Icounter; ++i) {
00053       fin >> Idummy;// id of current particle
00054       fout << Idummy << std::endl;
00055       fin >> Idummy; // type of current particle
00056       //fin >> Fdummy; // mass of current particle
00057     }
00058   }
00059 
00060   fin.close();
00061   fout.close();
00062   donedebug(DEBUG);
00063 }

00065 void CreateMergeParameterFile(unsigned isnap)
00066 {
00067   std::
00068     cout << " * Creating MergerTree parameter file..." <<
00069     Folder("amigabin");
00070   std::ofstream fout;
00071   fout.open((Folder("amigabin") + "parameters_MergerTree.txt").c_str(),
00072         std::ios_base::out);
00073   // taken out _particles'''2'''
00074   fout << "2" << std::
00075     endl << Folder("output") << Snaps(isnap) << "/ahf_out_particles2"
00076        << std::endl;
00077   fout << Folder("output") << Snaps(isnap) << "/ahf_out_particles2" <<
00078     std::endl;
00079   fout << Folder("output") << Snaps(isnap) << "/ahf_out_mtree" << std::
00080     endl << std::endl;
00081   fout.close();
00082   writedone();
00083 }

00085 void RunMergerTree(void)
00086 {
00087   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * Running MergerTree...");
00088   std::string now = "";
00089   now =
00090     Folder("amigabin") + "./MergerTree < " + Folder("amigabin") +
00091     "parameters_MergerTree.txt";
00092   RunCommand(now);
00093   //std::cin.get(); //wait for input
00094 }

00096 #include <map>
00097 void RunOwnMergerTree(int isnap)
00098 {
00099   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * Running own MergerTree..." );
00100   writedebug(DEBUG, " * * Extracting particle numbers... for #(halos) = " );
00101   std::ifstream fin;
00102   std::ofstream fout;
00103   fin.open((Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles").
00104        c_str(), std::ios_base::in);
00105   fout.open((Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_particles2").
00106         c_str(), std::ios_base::out);
00107   std::multimap < long, int >Particle_n_Halo;
00108   int Idummy = 0;
00109   long Ldummy = 0;
00110   int Ihalos = 0;
00111   int Icounter = 0;
00112   //  float Fdummy = 0.0f;
00113 
00114   fin >> Ihalos; //total number of halos
00115   std::cout << "Number of halos:" << Ihalos << std::endl << std::flush;
00116   int pop[Ihalos];
00117   for (int i = 0; i < Ihalos; ++i)
00118     pop[i] = 0;
00119   for (int i = 0; i < Ihalos; ++i) {
00120     //fin >> Idummy;        // which halo number
00121     fin >> Icounter;    // how many particles are inside this halo?
00122     pop[i] = Icounter;
00123     fout << Icounter << std::endl;
00124     std::cout <<Icounter<< " particles in halo " <<i<< std::endl;
00125     //fin >> Fdummy;//mass
00126     for (int j = 0; j < Icounter; ++j) {
00127       fin >> Ldummy;    // particle number
00128       fout << Ldummy << std::endl;
00129       Particle_n_Halo.insert(std::make_pair(Ldummy, i));
00130       fin >> Idummy;//type
00131       //fin >> Fdummy;//mass
00132     }
00133   }
00134   donedebug(DEBUG);
00135 
00136   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * Searching for shared particles..." );
00137   int *SH = new int[Ihalos * Ihalos];
00138   for (int m = 0; m < Ihalos; ++m)
00139     for (int n = 0; n < Ihalos; ++n)
00140       SH[m * Ihalos + n] = 0;
00141   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * * Starting map iterating..." );
00142   for (std::multimap < long, int >::iterator iter = Particle_n_Halo.begin();
00143        iter != Particle_n_Halo.end(); ++iter) {
00144     std::multimap < long, int >::iterator iter2 = iter, iter3;
00145     iter2 = Particle_n_Halo.find(iter->first);
00146     iter3 = Particle_n_Halo.upper_bound(iter->first);
00147     // std::cout << " * * * Checking for all halos the particle " << iter->
00148     // first << " belong to...";
00149     while (iter2 != iter3 ){ // Particle_n_Halo.end()) {
00150       int m = iter->second;
00151       int n = iter2->second;
00152       // std::cout << n << " ";
00153       SH[m * Ihalos + n]++;
00154       iter2++;
00155       // iter2 = Particle_n_Halo.find(iter->first);
00156     }
00157     // std::cout << std::endl;
00158   }
00159   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00160 
00161   std::cout << " * Output..." << std::flush;
00162   std::string ff = Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap) + "/ahf_out_mtree";
00163   std::ofstream foutm(ff.c_str());
00164   for (int m = 0; m < Ihalos; ++m) {
00165     for (int n = 0; n < Ihalos; ++n) {
00166       if(SH[m * Ihalos + n] > 0)
00167     foutm << m << " " << pop[m] << " " << SH[m * Ihalos +
00168                          n] << " " << n << " " <<
00169       pop[n] << std::endl;
00170     }
00171   }
00172   donedebug(DEBUG);
00173 
00174   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Closing files...");
00175   fin.close();
00176   fout.close();
00177   foutm.close();
00178   donedebug(DEBUG);
00179 
00180   delete[]SH;
00181   //std::cin.get(); //wait for input
00182 }

00184 void MoveMergeOut(unsigned isnap)
00185 {
00186   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Moving ahf_out_ files...");
00187   std::string now = "mv ahf_out_* " + Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap);
00188   RunCommand(now);
00189   donedebug(DEBUG);
00190 }
